Posts.Content: marianleah wrote: This Post was deleted by marianleah. Dx 10/17/2003, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 8/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 5 years this week! marianleah Nanda

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2008 06:28PM marianleah wrote: I don't come onto the Boards or into Chat as often as I used to...probably because with every day, week, month and year I find that I am stronger & more optimistic...but today I wanted to share with those of you who have recently had that scary Stage III diagnosis that here I am!  Five years later...happy, healthy and so very happy to continue to live NED.  Thank you to all of you who were here for me and I will try to come in more often to pay it forward.
Posts.Title: 5 years this week! marianleah Nanda

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2008 06:17PM marianleah wrote: Hello Ally, I see that you are getting lots of support and reassurance from these great ladies here.  I just wanted to add that on Friday, October 17th, I will be celebrating my five year cancerversary.  I am one of the many stage 111 er's who can tell you that you will raise your children and you will enjoy your grandchildren.  Stage III is scary, but survivable...enjoy every day and good luck.
Posts.Title: Help welcome AllyDub marianleah

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2007 06:58PM marianleah wrote: It will be four yrs for me in October. I'm now (finally) on every six months onc visit and annual mammos and surgeon visits. Been on an AI for 3 yrs and I'm doing great. Plan on staying NED for at least the next 40 yrs!
Posts.Title: Moving on Doctor visits as a stage IIIer. Fitztwins Karenfrew
